news.title: What are the new UK online safety rules and how will age checks on adult content be enforced?
news.summary: From 25 July websites and apps will be required to protect children by filtering out harmful content. It is a significant test for the Online Safety Act, a landmark piece of legislation.

news.title: AI summaries cause ‘devastating’ drop in audiences, online news media told
news.summary: Study claims sites previously ranked first can lose 79% of traffic if results appear below Google Overview. Threat posed by Google’s AI Overviews has risen to the top of the concerns among media owners.

news.title: UK student jailed for selling phishing kits linked to £100m of fraud
news.summary: Ollie Holman created phishing kits that mimicked government, bank and charity websites so that criminals could harvest victims’ personal information. 21-year-old student designed and distributed online kits linked to £100m worth of fraud.

news.title: Khruangbin, again? I quit Spotify for a month to escape samey algorithms – this is what I learned
news.summary: Spotify’s algorithm has anaesthetised artists I once enjoyed. Every time I hear the slippery psychedelic bass of Khruangbin slinking into one of my playlists, I violently hit skip. The problem with this listening experience isn’t just the creepy AI-driven intimacy of it all, more that the same songs are recycled.
